diff_act: 1.connect to the handset when off the hook

regen.absent_element: connection of call to the handset when it is off the hook and in use
regen.new_specification: The system shall connect the incoming group or broadcast voice call to the handset when the handset is off the hook, regardless of whether it is in use or not.

label: be connected to the handset if the handset is off hook.
absence: situation of the handset is off hook
